alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:25PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Garfield, southern Valley and western McCone Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 924 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Hell Creek Rec Area, or 33 miles southwest of Glasgow, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Fort Peck Marina, Hell Creek Rec Area, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Duck Creek Rec Area, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Brusett, Haxby, Park Grove and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Fort Peck Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
